mapper.select: select t1.username ,t1.nickname ,t2.article_id,t2.title ,t2.create_date ,t2.synopsis from uts_author t1 inner join dts_article t2 on t1.author_id = t2.author_id and t2.state = 1 and t2.title like concat('%',#{title},'%') order by t2.create_date desc

select t2.username ,t2.nickname ,t1.article_id ,t1.title ,t1.create_date ,t1.synopsis ,t3.text from dts_article t1 inner join uts_author t2 on t1.article_id = #{id} and t1.author_id = t2.author_id left join dts_article_content t3 on t1.article_id = t3.article_id

select t2.username ,t2.nickname ,t1.article_id ,t1.title ,t1.create_date ,t1.synopsis ,t3.text ,t3.markdown ,dbs.article_subject_id from dts_article t1 inner join uts_author t2 on t1.article_id = #{id} and t1.author_id = t2.author_id left join dts_article_content t3 on t1.article_id = t3.article_id left join dts_article_subject_relation dbsr on t1.article_id = dbsr.article_id left join dts_article_subject dbs on dbsr.article_subject_id = dbs.article_subject_id

select t1.username ,t1.nickname ,t2.article_id ,t2.title ,t2.create_date ,t2.synopsis ,t4.subject_name ,t4.article_subject_id from uts_author t1 inner join dts_article t2 on t1.author_id = t2.author_id and t1.username = #{username} left join dts_article_subject_relation t3 on t3.article_id = t2.article_id left join dts_article_subject t4 on t4.article_subject_id = t3.article_subject_id where t2.state = 1 order by t2.create_date desc
select t2.article_id ,t2.title ,t2.create_date from dts_article t2 where t2.state = 1 order by t2.create_date desc

select t1.username ,t1.nickname ,t2.article_id ,t2.title ,t2.create_date ,t2.synopsis from uts_author t1 inner join dts_article t2 on t1.author_id = t2.author_id
and t2.state = 1
order by t2.create_date desc
